attributes.action: MALI - No involvement for British troops
attributes.additional_details:
We do NOT want British troops sent to MALI.
We do NOT want any more British lives lost.
We do NOT want to fund another war.
We do NOT want reprisals from terrorists carried out on our shores.
No more involvement in wars in other countries.
And finally, let the French sort out their own problems, like they leave us to sort out ours.
